summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeWith Joico Dream Blowout Thermal Protection Creme, you'll cut drying time in half, while safeguarding strands for a full 24 hours against the effects of thermal styling, humidity, frizz, and even damage caused by pollution. Enjoy luxurious locks in minutes!
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides heat protection up to 450°F (232°C)Reduces breakage by over 75%*Controls frizz and staticUp to 50% faster drying timeLong-lasting results, with protection against humidity*Against combing breakage on damaged hair vs. a non-conditioning shampooKey IngredientsManketti Nut Oil is packed with Vitamins E and A and linoleic acid. It helps to lock in moisture and provide strength, softness, and shine.Safflower Seed Oil is a rich source of Vitamin E, antioxidants, and essential fatty acids that help protect, nourish, and hydrate hair.Arginine is a naturally occurring amino acid crucial to hair's strength. Products that include Arginine help protect hair and rebuild it from the inside out.Item 2558777How To UseApply evenly through clean, damp hair and blow-dry.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil Phytosterol Esters, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Schinziophyton Rautanenii Kernel Oil, Laurdimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Arginine Hcl, Phosphatidylcholine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-37, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glyceryl Laurate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Isopropyl Alcohol, Lauryl Glucoside, Sodium Gluconate, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Fragrance/Parfum.
how_to_use: Apply evenly through clean, damp hair and blow-dry.
ingredients: Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil Phytosterol Esters

reviews.headline: shine smooth shine !!
reviews.comments: Every time Im around people I always get complimented on how shiny my hair is !! Some times they just gotta touch it …

reviews.headline: Zero stars
reviews.comments: There is zero to like about this product.  It doesn't make blow drying faster, it doesn't smooth or remove frizz and instead of smelling pleasant like the Joico Color therapy I'm used to this smells like plastic.  Don't waste your money, it's truly awful.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Wanted to live it and it smells good but not for thick curly hair it frizzes even the non color processed hair making it look like I just bleached and damaged my hair. It is waxy feeling and I barely used any product.

reviews.headline: New formula?
reviews.comments: I am so sad! This use to be my staple after every hair wash. It would leave hair soft after blowdry and curling, but now it seems thick when in hair and almost leaves it waxy. It leaves my hair damaged and dry. This product was once great.

reviews.headline: THIS is the whole grail heat or no heat
reviews.comments: I use this every time after hairwash day whether I shower or not. I will buy this for the rest of my life. It decreases frizz and makes my hair look great whether I let my hair air dry or If I dry and style it. This is a must have.

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: I have used this a handful of times and im obsessed! Heat protectant + leaves hair smooth, soft and shiny?! What more do you need. A little goes a long way so be careful. At least you know youll be getting your $$ worth. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: My hair Must-Have!
reviews.comments: This is my go-to hair "must have!" My hair literally cannot function without it! It smells amazing and makes my hair feel sooo silky smooth! Since I've started using this product I get so many compliments on how amazing my hair looks. LOVE!

reviews.headline: #1 hair product
reviews.comments: I absolutely LOVE this product.  Before using this, I had to flat iron my hair for it to stay straight/not frizzy.  Since adding this to my wash day routine, I can blow out with my Shark brush hair dryer and no longer have to use a flat iron. MAGICAL

reviews.headline: Broken
reviews.comments: My bottle had a broken so I was not too happy. I'm able to still use it by tipping it over, but the pump was broken when it arrived.

reviews.headline: Works great !
reviews.comments: Helps the frizz and protects my hair from hot heat tools.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: I would buy this product again I can really tell the difference in my hair.

reviews.headline: New staple!
reviews.comments: Let me just start out by saying I only wash my hair one or twice a week followed by either blow drying with my Dyson air wrap or letting it air dry. This product has been a game changer! I have very thick long hair and one pump is enough for me. My blow outs and curls have lasted a whole week. It says it helps cut time in half, and for me I'm able to blow dry my hair, smooth it out, and air wrap some curls and be done in less than 20 minutes! I highly recommend you all try it out

reviews.headline: Highly recommend!
reviews.comments: This product is a great follow-up after using the K-PAK Reconstructing Shampoo & Conditioner! I brush my hair out and put 1 to 2 pumps throughout my hair and start to dry it within 5 minutes. I'd say it cut down drying time by 3 to 5 minutes but it helps as I use a lot of heat on my hair after washing it, blow dry and straightener.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I use it before blow drying my hair.  Reduces damage to my fine hair.

reviews.headline: A MUST TO USE!
reviews.comments: I have used this product for several months now.  It does protect my hair from daily drying.  It is silky yet light.

reviews.headline: I love this product it smells so good
reviews.comments: This product works So good it makes my hair smell good it makes my hair soft smooth and the protection that gives is amazing

reviews.headline: Redken Satinwear Replacement
reviews.comments: I use mostly Redken products, but I think the pandemic has hit haircare now. As I have been forced to find other products, I tried this one. If you are looking for a replacement for the Redken Satinwear 02, look no further! This is most comparable to that product. It works very well. I gave it three stars for the smell. Like others have said, the smell is not great. Nothing masks it. However, it's benefits out weigh the smell. Give it a try if you are looking for great protection through any type of weather with reduced drying time.

reviews.headline: hair  feels weighed down and hard to dry
reviews.comments: I use 2 pumps for the amount of hair I have. I rub the product between my hands to distribute evenly. Then it takes over 45 minutes to dry my hair with this product. Which after leaves my hair feeling heavy and weighted down. It has a greasy looking texture and feel to it. I would not recommend this product for those who have thick hair.

reviews.headline: Smells like vegetable oil.
reviews.comments: This product smells soooo bad! You basically smell like you ran vegetable oil through your hair. While it may work well, the smell is overwhelming. Even adding other products doesn't cover the horrid smell.

reviews.headline: Super product
reviews.comments: Does what it claims to do!
